name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.3.0-f3b28fcb2b9d24870da24b8598a8cafa1ce4da0c "index template [winning_v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [winning_v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
